paragraphs.text: Southern Baptist Convention President: The spiritual state of our union.
paragraphs.label: title

paragraphs.text: Questions Worth Asking
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: I love America and believe each citizen needs to be involved in charting the future of our nation
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Our churches have compartmentalized faith and kept it from influencing our nation for far too long, just as most of America's leaders compartmentalize their faith from their politics
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Today, our nation has become a product of this sad reality
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: We need to return to the conviction that a faith worth believing in is a faith worth dying for
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Our faith cannot be checked at the door like a piece of luggage at an airport
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The Time is Now
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The time is now for our nation to recognize that we cannot fix ourselves
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The signs of our brokenness are glistening in our dark world
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The blatant destruction of the family, the killing of unborn children, the continuing racial tension, the rebellion against authority, the ongoing reality of poverty, the rising threat of our security, the clear attacks against religious liberty and, of all things, the arrogance to believe the highest court in our land can rule on what the Bible says is genuine marriage testify to just how broken we really are
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Where Do We Go From Here?
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: We need to repent
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Repentance occurs when we have a change of mind
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: This change of mind changes our behavior
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: As a nation, we need to personally and collectively repent of our sins
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: We need to ask God for His free gift of forgiveness for the sins we have committed, resulting in change from that point forward
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: We need to return to God
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: America is a nation that was built on a deep belief in God
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: A desire for religious liberty was the catalyst for the beginning of our nation
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: While
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: we have gone through ups and downs in our history
paragraphs.label: common-ground

paragraphs.text: God has been very merciful and gracious toward us
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: It is time to return to God
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: It is time to stop making every issue about ourselves, posturing to ensure we get our way
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: God's way is the only way
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: There is no other
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Anything less than God's way diminishes our happiness, our fulfillment and even our liberty
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: We need our churches to wake up
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Churches all over our nation need to wake up from the slumber we find ourselves in as a whole
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: We need pastors to return to their spiritual calling, be rekindled by the fire of God and declare the hope we have in the Lord
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: As a pastor goes, so goes the church
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: As our churches go, so goes our nation
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The evidence is overwhelming of just how broken we are as a nation
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: This is the greatest hour for our churches to rise up
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Never more has America needed our churches to lead the way forward
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: serving and influencing our communities with compassion and hope
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: We need a spiritual awakening
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: In our history, there have been seasons of spiritual awakening that have influenced the spiritual state of our nation dramatically
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Lives were changed
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: and
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: subcultures became different
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Spiritual awakening is our greatest need in America today
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: There are many who have probably never even thought about this need
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Others may feel we have gone too far
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: But I want to assure you
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: God can do more in a moment than we can ever do in a lifetime
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Wherever you are in life, would you just stop for one moment and pray something like this:"God, would you please bring spiritual awakening to America?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: It is our greatest need."?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: America's greatest need is the next great move of God
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: This is our hope
paragraphs.label: assumption
